task.title: Editing a WebHelp Publishing Template from oXygen XML Editor/Author

context.p: Use this procedure to edit a WebHelp Publishing Template package.

step.note: Skip this step if your publishing template is already stored in a folder.
step.cmd: Unzip the ZIP archive associated with the WebHelp Publishing Template in a separate folder.
Link the folder associated with the WebHelp Publishing Template in the Project view.
Using the Project view, you can modify the resources (CSS, JS, fonts) within the publishing template folder to fit your needs.
Open the publishing template descriptor in editor to edit. You will benefit by content completion and validation support.

step.note: You can skip this step. A WebHelp Publishing Template can be stored also in a folder.
step.cmd: Once to finish your customization you can archive the folder as ZIP.
